server.controller

Class ServerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ocsf.server.AbstractServer
      • server.controller.ServerController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ServerController
extends AbstractServer
    this class is the server controller class, the class connects between the client controllers to the DB logic classes and to the DB. there's many handlers functions each with its purpose.
    Version:
    Final
    Author:
    MyFuel Team

        public void register(com.google.gson.JsonObject requestJson)
        this function handle request to register a customer to the system it gets the request JsonObject with the details and calls to the customerDBLogic methods

      • handleUserMessage

        public Message handleUserMessage(Message msg)
        this function handle messages from the client that related to User methods. it goes to the right case and activate the right function of DBLogic.
        Parameters:
        msg - - the message from the client
        Returns:
        - response message from the server to the client
